Maarten Schmidt via Caltech.
Today in science: On February 5, 1963, Dutch astronomer and Caltech professor Maarten Schmidt had a eureka moment when studying a quasi-stellar radio source, or quasar, … [+6569 chars]

articles.title: Neil deGrasse Tyson Blames Pink Floyd for Confusion Over 'The Dark Side of the Moon' - Billboard
articles.description: Neil deGrasse Tyson might just be the world's most famous astrophysicist. Because of this, he's often approached to debunk or prove some of the most popular theories. The one he's asked about the most is entirely to blame on Pink Floyd.
